speakerTitle: Sr. Consultant, App Innovation | Modern Work

speakerInformation:
1. Marketing professional by choice and engineer by academics, with the strong entrepreneurial spirit of startups and rigorous operational discipline of corporates.
2. Passionate tech story-teller with 15+ years at Fortune 500 companies and promising startups in the IT and IT-enabled services sectors - specifically cloud, developer and emerging technologies.
3. Hands-on experience in building and nurturing long-term, high-value and result-oriented relationships with technology community heroes, thought leaders, influencers, BDMs and TDMs.
4. CMO Award Winner (Forward Thinker award) at IBM, a top recognition personally awarded by the CMO – the first of the 3 award-winners globally in IBM to receive this honor in the very first year of award inception.
5. Award winner for “Best Customer Passion” within the first year of employment with Microsoft India.
6. Among the top 300 Young Leaders in India – per the Economic Times Young Leaders 2011 Program, a pan-India initiative to identify and recognize Indian managers between the age of 26 and 32.

speakerTitle: Power partner to propel digital transformation
speakerInformation: Arvind is a seasoned business transformation leader focusing on delivering effective and targeted business solutions that drive real results. As a transformation leader, he identifies opportunities to improve efficiency, enable cost reduction, and consolidate resources, delivering process improvements and organizational change. He is a trusted adviser and partner to key stakeholders, providing thoughtful analysis and counsel to implement change management programs such as digitization, cloud migration, standardization, and citizen development.

speakerTitle: Power partner to propel digital transformation
speakerInformation: Kirti is an Office Development MVP and Microsoft Certified Trainer, has 15+ years of progressive experience in Architect, Designing, Developing, Deployment and Administration of SharePoint Applications and Implementation of business applications in Client/Server and Distributed Environments. Kirti works with clients to develop and deploy comprehensive solutions on SharePoint and Office 365.
Solution Architect in Power Platform part of niche technology & consulting team in TCS called Rapid Apps Automation.

A results oriented consultant with experience in Microsoft Technologies especially with Microsoft 365, Power Platform, and Microsoft Azure. Experienced in design, implementation, configuration, and maintenance of several large-scale projects.

Arvind is a seasoned business transformation leader focusing on delivering effective and targeted business solutions that drive real results. Experienced Architect with a demonstrated history of working in the management consulting industry. Skilled in Requirements Analysis, Designing, Customer Relationship, Leadership with strong consulting skills

Sathish is a Microsoft MVP for SharePoint (Office Servers and Services) having 17+ years of experience in Microsoft Technologies. He holds a Masters Degree in Computer Aided Design (M.Tech) and Business Administration (M.B.A). He is passionate about learning and sharing the tricks and tips in SharePoint.

speakerTitle: Microsoft MVP(Office Development), MCT, Author, Speaker, Organizer
speakerInformation: SharePoint professional with 14+ years of experience in design, implementation, configuration, and maintenance of large-scale projects. Focuses on architectural design and implementation, website design and development, and complete application development cycles, with an intense focus on SharePoint and Office 365. A frequent speaker at various community events, including SPS, Global Microsoft 365 Developer Bootcamp, and Global Power Platform Bootcamp.
